thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Anne Bertolino
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Anne Bertolino

author: Anne Bertolino
title: Anne Bertolino
text: My claim was paid in 3 days. I would recommend Pets Best to other dog owners looking for a good pet insurance company. My dog had ACL surgery and they paid the full per incident amount. I have called customer service several times and have never been disappointed in the information and concern that I received.
